text: wallh sjanh wteala khalaqakum thuma yumitukum fi nihayat aemarkm, waminkum man yasir 'iilaa arda aleumr wahu alhrm, kama kan fi tfwlth la yaelam shyyana mimma kan yelmh, 'iina allah ealim qdyr, 'ahat ealamah waqudratah bikuli shy', fallah aldhy rdd al'iinsan 'iilaa hadhih alhalat qadir ealaa 'an ymyth, thuma ybethh
